data.title: Public outcry of animal cruelty lands Thai TV series in hot water
data.description: A scene depicting a vomiting, writhing black cat that eventually goes lifeless sparks ire, but checks show the feline in fine fettle

data.title: Chaiwat found not guilty in defamation case filed by ex-DNP chief
data.description: The criminal court said the DNP official was acting in his official capacity when he led a sting operation to expose Ratchada’s alleged bribery demands

data.title: Yingluck must comply with law if she is to return, Thawee says
data.description: Thaksin has said exiled ex-PM Yingluck plans to return for next year’s Songkran festival

data.title: Political battle heats up in Sisaket
data.description: Pheu Thai going all out, aiming to settle scores with Bhumjaithai Party

data.title: Suriya reveals latest on Khao Kradong issue in Buri Ram
data.description: Minister of transport says State Railway of Thailand has complied with court rulings in the matter

data.title: Erawan Bangkok turns twenty with new look
data.description: Erawan Bangkok has finally finished its revamp process and boasts various tenants to live up to its “Eat-Play-Live” concept.

data.title: Trump’s policies may spell economic uncertainty for Thailand: NESDC
data.description: Trade barriers, fluctuating currency rates and tightened immigration policies could impact Thailand’s export sector and the broader economy, says the council

data.title: Uno Mas hosts special dinners for two nights only
data.description: Chef Yoshitsugu Yamamoto, the owner of the Michelin-starred Alarde in Osaka, Japan, will take over Uno Mas at Centara Grand at CentralWorld for two nights on Nov 21-22.

data.title: Fashion designer princess showcases her new collection
data.description: The latest designs for men and women by Her Royal Highness Princess Sirivannavari take a bow at the National Art Gallery

data.title: MG, Mercedes win top awards in Thailand for automotive excellence
data.description: MG3 Hybrid+ and Mercedes EQS 450 SUV win best vehicles awards for their outstanding design, innovation and performance

data.title: Barrier experiment spurs hope for seagrass recovery in Trang
data.description: Efforts to restore seagrass beds accelerate to address the dwindling food supply for the rapidly declining dugong population in the region

data.title: Thailand enlists US influencers to boost authentic Thai restaurants
data.description: Commerce minister hands Select certificates of authenticity to seven stateside Thai restaurants at glitzy Hollywood ceremony

data.title: Anutin boasts Bhumjaithai will beat Pheu Thai and People’s Party
data.description: Interior minister dismisses predictions of parliamentary takeover made by ruling party and main rival

data.title: Thailand taps Turkish expertise in high-speed train manufacturing
data.description: Transport minister Suriya visits Turkey’s state-owned Türasaş for lessons in forging a domestic rail-manufacturing industry

data.title: NBTC and AIS demonstrate progress of cell broadcast emergency alert system in live network testing in Phuket
data.description: With a connection to the National Command Center, the system provides assurance to Thais nationwide

data.title: Thailand eyes possibility of accessing Green Climate Fund
data.description: Discussions with the GCF’s chief investment officer focused on intention to apply for support for the country’s climate mitigation efforts

data.title: Attorney General Office refuses to process case against Thaksin
data.description: The decision does not however prevent the Constitutional Court from deliberating on whether Thaksin and Pheu Thai violated Section 49

data.title: Visit Thailand, register on the campaign site, and get special gifts!
data.description: Just travel to Thailand and register on the campaign's website to experience the unique charm of Thailand by receiving special gifts,  the rare items that everyone wants to have, under the "5 Must Do in Thailand" concept.

data.title: Asia Cement donated 113 tons of cement for flood aid in Phayao and Chiang Rai
data.description:
Asia Cement, in partnership with Phayao Province, Chiang Rai Province, valued customers, dealers, and volunteer craftsmen, donated a total of 113 tons of Dokbua Cement (2,420 bags) to rehabilitate and assist flood victims in both provinces.

As part of the “Strong Cement, Doi

data.title: Joint initiative spearheads self-care in Asia-Pacific
data.description: A new initiative signed on November 15, by representatives of governments, national regulators, NGOs and the private sector recognises the value of self-care and self-care medical products for enhancing well-being in the Asia-Pacific region.

data.title: Rhapsody In Blue – a timeless American classic
data.description: On Feb 12, 1924, a concert organised by popular jazz band leader Paul Whiteman was held at the Aeolian Hall in New York City. Despite the cold and snow, the show was jam-packed not only with music fans but also composers like Sergei Rachmaninov and John Philip Souza and popular actors like Gertrude Lawrence.

data.title: Colombian-French artist David Rodriguez brings cultural fusion to Bangkok
data.description: The beauty of cultural fusion is portrayed through art during "Bailemos", which is running at the Art Exhibition Space, 5th floor of Siam Discovery, Rama I Road, until Sunday.

data.title: Unicef marks Children's Day with a new campaign
data.description: To mark World Children

data.title: Follow Jungkook's journey in new documentary
data.description: As Korean heartthrob Jungkook is serving in the military, Disney+ Hotstar will premiere a new three-part docuseries titled The Original on Dec 3, allowing fans to follow his growth from being a member of BTS to becoming an acclaimed solo artist.

data.title: A gathering of ghosts
data.description: Among Thai ghosts, the top three legends -- Mae Nak, Phee Pob and Phee Krasue -- have frequently featured in films and television series. According to Creative Economy Agency (CEA), Mae Nak has appeared in over 40 films and TV series while Phee Pob has made over 30 appearances in films and TV series.

data.title: Famous Thai voiceover team to wrap up its iconic career next year
data.description: Phantamit, known for dubbing big-screen hits like “The Storm Riders” and “Shaolin Soccer”, set to wrap up its 30-plus years in the Thai entertainment industry during Songkran

data.title: Legal avenue regarding land dispute at Khao Kradong proposed
data.description: Key document in effect acknowledges that the land belongs to the SRT and is a public asset, lawyer says

data.title: Thai Airways launches debt-to-equity conversion as part of rehab plan
data.description: SEC gives the airline a go-ahead to get creditors to convert existing debt into equity, marking a huge step towards THAI exiting rehab

data.title: NHSO unveils first ‘Care Box’ in Bangkok to improve healthcare access
data.description: The kiosk connects patients with doctors to provide treatment for 42 common illnesses, helping residents save time and effort by eliminating the need to visit hospitals or clinics

data.title: Dredging of Ping River discussed to counter flooding in Chiang Mai
data.description: Local agencies in Chiang Mai province on Monday discussed a dredging operation in the Ping River in a bid to address flooding in the long term.

data.title: Digital Economy Ministry targets online scams
data.description: ‘DE-fence’ platform designed to protect citizens from fraudulent calls and SMS text messages

data.title: Thai tuna industry commits to sustainable fishing, local sourcing
data.description: MoU underscores dedication to supporting local fishermen and adhering to international sustainability standards

data.title: Thai economy shows resilience in Q3, positive outlook for 2024-2025
data.description: In the third quarter, several key economic drivers significantly contributed to growth, NESDC says

data.title: Thailand increases flights to tackle New Year ticket price rise
data.description: Six airlines collaborating to provide additional 247 flights that will offer 73,388 extra seats
